code: var save=function save(key,value){try{var serializedState=JSON.stringify(value);localStorage.setItem(key,serializedState);}catch(error){console.error("Set state error: ",error.message);}};var load=function load(key){try{var serializedState=localStorage.getItem(key);return serializedState===null?undefined:JSON.parse(serializedState);}catch(error){console.error("Get state error: ",error.message);}};var localStorageCustom={save:save,load:load};export default localStorageCustom;
